Trade/Device Name(s): GlucoVitaal H1A Blood Glucose Monitoring System
GlucoVitaal H1A Blood Glucose Test Strips
Instrument(s)/Platform(s): GlucoVitaal H1A Blood Glucose Test Meter
Document Summary: FDA 510(k) summary for GlucoVitaal H1A Blood Glucose Monitoring System for quantitative measurement of glucose in fresh capillary whole blood
Indications for Use Summary: Intended for self-testing by people with diabetes at home for the quantitative measurement of glucose in fresh capillary whole blood samples from various body sites; not for diagnosis or screening of diabetes or neonatal use.
